Their body are included in the three kinds of craving for continued existence. Their body is dissoluted and has been oppresed. Your body is suffering.

ai-pe1:143.2_0: Seven on lying down: he must lay down on the seventh day.

ai-pe1:143.11_0: Herein, hate is a root of the perception and its root.
ai-pe1:143.13_0: Delusion is the root of the views, the unskillful is increased.
ai-pe1:143.14_0: The roots of hate are the three roots:
ai-pe1:143.15_0: wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort,
ai-pe1:143.16_0: There are three roots, three roots, and three.
ai-pe1:143.17_0: wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-pe1:143.18_0: Delusion is the root of the unskillful.
ai-pe1:143.20_0: In this way the unwholesome (deeds) do not apply themselves to the influence of language and the other two, and the forty-two systems must be treated with each other.
ai-pe1:143.21_0: And cessation is the four paths to cessation, four blossoms of success in the mode of others.

ai-pe1:150.1_0: Virtuously, in the first place called Mahāsudassana, the first being spoken by the Buddha as spoken by the name of the noble truth, profession of the way that is called soul.
